trans_title: 世界上最极端的电视节目
introduction: 本节目将向观众们介绍世界各地播出的最极端的电视节目。The Most Extreme TV Programmes Broadcast Around The World Are Packed Into This 80-Minute Special. From A Mexican Hidden Camera Show That Nearly Gives Contestants A Heart Attack To The Japanese Game Show Where The Public Have To Guess The Teenage Virgin. Also Not Forgetting, Russians Gameshows That Involve The Police Chasing A Crook (Who If Outruns The Police Wins The Car), Live Surgeries Including A Sex Change, And The Notorious Johny Noxville And How He Became Famous And All The Copycats That Followed.
chinese_title: 世界上最极端的电视节目
